query:
SELECT 
                p.id,
                p.phrase_text,
                p.active,
                p.created_by,
                p.created_at,
                p.updated_at,
                CASE WHEN uep.phrase_id IS NOT NULL THEN true ELSE false END as is_excluded
            FROM phrases p
            LEFT JOIN user_excluded_phrases uep ON p.id = uep.phrase_id AND uep.user_id = $1
            WHERE p.active = true
            ORDER BY p.created_at DESC
